pageContext.claim: “We are bringing our jobs, our factories, and our troops, our beautiful, beloved troops. We're bringing them all back home.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is pressing to remove some U.S. troops from overseas. Whether they will all be removed from Iraq and Afghanistan by the end of his term was highly doubtful, given congressional opposition. On Jan. 1, 2021, Congress overturned Trump's veto of the defense authorization bill, which included limits on his ability to bring troops back to the United States. Moreover, not all U.S. troops are coming home, which is how Trump often frames it in his campaign rallies.
